Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Tur1B  (natural AMPs; Dolphin, mammals, marine animals; Pro-rich; PrAMPs, UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 53% similarity toTur1A. molecular formula: C197H293N55O37; Mol Wt: 4032.812; GRAVY = -1.Activity: Active against E. coli BW25113 (MIC 7 uM). The peptide also contains multiple Trp (althought not rich <25%). Its mechanism of action appears to be different from Tur1B.  3/2018; 7/2021.
Literature Information.Author: Mardirossian M, Pérébaskine N, Benincasa M, Gambato S, Hofmann S, Huter P, Müller C, Hilpert K, Innis CA, Tossi A, Wilson DN.2018
Literature Information.Title: The Dolphin Proline-Rich Antimicrobial Peptide Tur1A Inhibits Protein Synthesis by Targeting the Bacterial Ribosome.
